name: Wild Bonfire
description:
You are stuck in a valley full of cannibals, and your only hope of survival lies in the bonfire you've lit. 

Can you keep it alight long enough to see the morning?

Controls are as such:

WSAD to move around

E to pick up/put things on fire

Q to drop things

Left Control to attack

You need to survive 5 minutes to win. Your bonfire is constantly getting smaller and smaller, so you need wood to keep it alight.
However, the more trees you cut down, the further you'll have to travel for more wood, and the more things you'll see lurking in the dark...

You also get hungry. You can find meat by killing enemies, and you can cook that meat on a fire and eat it to replenish hunger.
Keeping well-fed replenishes health slowly.

Made in 5 days for a school Game Jam, original art by OUTDOOR IN DOOR.
